code:
export default {
  colors: {
    accents1: "$gray100",
    accents2: "$gray200",
    accents3: "$gray300",
    accents4: "$gray400",
    accents5: "$gray500",
    accents6: "$gray600",
    accents7: "$gray700",
    accents8: "$gray800",
    accents9: "$gray900",
    text: "$gray800",
    background: "$white",
    foreground: "$black",
    codeLight: "$pink100",
    code: "$pink600",
    border: "$gray200",
    selection: "$blue200"
  },
  shadows: {
    xs: "-4px 0 4px rgb(0 0 0 / 5%);",
    sm: "0 5px 20px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)",
    md: "0 8px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15)",
    lg: "0 30px 60px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15)",
    xl: "0 40px 80px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25)"
  }
};

sourcesContent: export default{colors:{accents1:"$gray100",accents2:"$gray200",accents3:"$gray300",accents4:"$gray400",accents5:"$gray500",accents6:"$gray600",accents7:"$gray700",accents8:"$gray800",accents9:"$gray900",text:"$gray800",background:"$white",foreground:"$black",codeLight:"$pink100",code:"$pink600",border:"$gray200",selection:"$blue200"},shadows:{xs:"-4px 0 4px rgb(0 0 0 / 5%);",sm:"0 5px 20px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)",md:"0 8px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15)",lg:"0 30px 60px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15)",xl:"0 40px 80px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25)"}};
